targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM node_details WHERE node_id = '${nodeID}' LIMIT 1

panels.description: Graph that is built from Neighbor Info reports and shows the signal strenth for each line

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    node_id AS "id", 
    long_name AS "title", 
    hardware_model AS "detail__Hardware Detail", 
    role AS "detail__Client Role", 
    mqtt_status AS "detail__MQTT Status", 
    short_name AS "subtitle",
    CASE 
        WHEN mqtt_status = 'online' THEN '#2ECC71'  -- Green for online
        WHEN mqtt_status = 'offline' THEN '#E74C3C' -- Red for offline
        ELSE '#808080'                              -- Gray for none or any other status
    END AS "color"
FROM 
    node_details
    WHERE node_id IN (${nodeID:singlequote}) OR node_id IN (${relatives:singlequote})

SELECT 
    CONCAT(neighbor_id, '_', node_id) AS id,
    neighbor_id AS "source",
    node_id AS "target",
    snr AS "mainstat",
    CASE
        WHEN snr < -13 THEN '#E74C3C'  -- Red for SNR < -13
        WHEN snr < -7 THEN '#F4D03F'   -- Yellow for -13 ≤ SNR < -7
        ELSE '#2ECC71'                 -- Green for SNR ≥ -7
    END AS "color",
    GREATEST(0.1, LEAST(2, 1 + ((snr + 13) / 10))) AS "thickness"
FROM 
    node_neighbors
    WHERE (neighbor_id IN (${nodeID:singlequote}) OR neighbor_id IN (${relatives:singlequote}))
    AND (node_id IN (${nodeID:singlequote}) OR node_id IN (${relatives:singlequote}))

panels.title: Node Graph

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  node_id,
  CASE
    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM environment_update_interval) > 1
    THEN to_char(environment_update_interval, 'HH24:MI:SS')
    ELSE NULL
  END AS environment_update_interval,
  to_char(environment_update_last_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS environment_update_last_timestamp,
  
  CASE
    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM device_update_interval) > 1
    THEN to_char(device_update_interval, 'HH24:MI:SS')
    ELSE NULL
  END AS device_update_interval,
  to_char(device_update_last_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS device_update_last_timestamp,
  
  CASE
    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM air_quality_update_interval) > 1
    THEN to_char(air_quality_update_interval, 'HH24:MI:SS')
    ELSE NULL
  END AS air_quality_update_interval,
  to_char(air_quality_update_last_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS air_quality_update_last_timestamp,
  
  CASE
    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM power_update_interval) > 1
    THEN to_char(power_update_interval, 'HH24:MI:SS')
    ELSE NULL
  END AS power_update_interval,
  to_char(power_update_last_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS power_update_last_timestamp,
  
  CASE
    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM range_test_interval) > 1
    THEN to_char(range_test_interval, 'HH24:MI:SS')
    ELSE NULL
  END AS range_test_interval,
  to_char(range_test_last_packet_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS range_test_last_packet_timestamp,
  
  CASE
    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM pax_counter_interval) > 1
    THEN to_char(pax_counter_interval, 'HH24:MI:SS')
    ELSE NULL
  END AS pax_counter_interval,
  to_char(pax_counter_last_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS pax_counter_last_timestamp,
  
  CASE
    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM neighbor_info_interval) > 1
    THEN to_char(neighbor_info_interval, 'HH24:MI:SS')
    ELSE NULL
  END AS neighbor_info_interval,
  to_char(neighbor_info_last_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS neighbor_info_last_timestamp,
  
  CASE
    WHEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM map_broadcast_interval) > 1
    THEN to_char(map_broadcast_interval, 'HH24:MI:SS')
    ELSE NULL
  END AS map_broadcast_interval,
  to_char(map_broadcast_last_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS map_broadcast_last_timestamp,
  
  mqtt_encryption_enabled,
  mqtt_json_enabled,
  mqtt_configured_root_topic,
  to_char(mqtt_info_last_timestamp, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS mqtt_info_last_timestamp,
  
  to_char(last_updated, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS last_updated
FROM node_configurations
WHERE
  (EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM environment_update_interval) > 1 OR
   EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM device_update_interval) > 1 OR
   EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM air_quality_update_interval) > 1 OR
   EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM power_update_interval) > 1 OR
   EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM range_test_interval) > 1 OR
   EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM pax_counter_interval) > 1 OR
   EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM neighbor_info_interval) > 1 OR
   EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM map_broadcast_interval) > 1)
  AND node_id = '${nodeID}'
LIMIT 50

SELECT node_id, short_name, long_name, hardware_model, role, mqtt_status, 
longitude * 1e-7 as longitude,
latitude * 1e-7 as latitude,
altitude
FROM node_details 
WHERE node_id = '${nodeID}' LIMIT 1

panels.description: Displays the measured current from the channels (1,2,3)
panels.title: Current measured from node

list.definition:
SELECT 
  concat(long_name, ' (', node_id, ')') as __text, 
  node_id as __value 
FROM node_details 
ORDER BY long_name
list.label: Node ID
list.name: nodeID
list.query:
SELECT 
  concat(long_name, ' (', node_id, ')') as __text, 
  node_id as __value 
FROM node_details 
ORDER BY long_name

list.definition:
SELECT 
    neighbor_id AS "source",
    node_id AS "target"
FROM 
    node_neighbors
WHERE node_id = ${nodeID:singlequote} OR neighbor_id = ${nodeID:singlequote}
list.label: relatives
list.name: relatives
list.query:
SELECT 
    neighbor_id AS "source",
    node_id AS "target"
FROM 
    node_neighbors
WHERE node_id = ${nodeID:singlequote} OR neighbor_id = ${nodeID:singlequote}
